item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘They don’t understand my life’: what the Democrats misread about America
2. Billionaire hedge fund manager lines himself up for Treasury secretary role
3. Biden urges reconciliation as Democrats begin blame game
4. Fed cuts interest rates as Powell says he will not resign as chair
5. Trump chooses Susie Wiles as White House chief of staff
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
